name: IOMemoryDescriptor
desc: An abstract base class that defines common methods for describing physical or virtual memory.

items.name: - initWithOptions
items.desc: Primary initializer for all variants of memory descriptors.

items.name: + withOptions
items.desc: Primary initializer for all variants of memory descriptors.

items.name: + withAddress
items.desc: Creates an IOMemoryDescriptor to describe one virtual range of the kernel task.

items.name: + withAddressRange
items.desc: Creates an IOMemoryDescriptor to describe one virtual range of the specified map.

items.name: + withAddressRanges
items.desc: Creates an IOMemoryDescriptor to describe one or more virtual ranges.

items.name: + withPersistentMemoryDescriptor
items.desc: Copy constructor that generates a new memory descriptor if the backing memory for the same task's virtual address and length has changed.

items.name: + withPhysicalAddress
items.desc: Creates an IOMemoryDescriptor to describe one physical range.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the memory descriptor object.

items.name: - setOwnership
items.desc: Set the task that owns the descriptorâ€™s memory.

items.name: - setPurgeable
items.desc: Control the purgeable status of a memory descriptors memory.

items.name: - prepare
items.desc: Prepare the memory for an I/O transfer.

items.name: - complete
items.desc: Complete processing of the memory after an I/O transfer finishes.

items.name: - readBytes
items.desc: Copy data from the memory descriptor's buffer to the specified buffer.

items.name: - writeBytes
items.desc: Copy data to the memory descriptor's buffer from the specified buffer.

items.name: - createMappingInTask
items.desc: Maps an IOMemoryDescriptor into a task.

items.name: - map
items.desc: Maps an IOMemoryDescriptor into the kernel map.

items.name: - setMapping
items.desc: Establishes an already existing mapping.

items.name: - getPageCounts
items.desc: Retrieve the number of resident and/or dirty pages encompassed by a memory descriptor.

items.name: - getPhysicalAddress
items.desc: Return the physical address of the first byte in the memory.

items.name: - getPhysicalSegment
items.desc: Break a memory descriptor into its physically contiguous segments.

items.name: - getDirection
items.desc: Gets the direction of memory transfers associated with the descriptor.

items.name: - getLength
items.desc: Accessor to get the length of the memory descriptor (over all its ranges).

items.name: - GetLength
items.desc: Returns the length of the memory block represented by this object.

items.name: - getFlags
items.desc: Returns the options used to create the memory descriptor.

items.name: - getTag
items.desc: Accessor to the retrieve the tag for the memory descriptor.

items.name: - setTag
items.desc: Set the tag for the memory descriptor.

items.name: - performOperation
items.desc: Perform an operation on the memory descriptor's memory.

items.name: - Map
items.desc: Maps memory internally.
